turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order two small thin-crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat Lovers and a Veggie Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering 2 small thin crust pizzas, 1 meatlovers and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be all. Thank you.
